p.s: In the given speech by Barack Obama which was given on the 7th of November 2007 in Bettendorf, Iowa Obama tries to convince the audience that everybody havehas the same opportunities to have a decenddecent livelife whitwith a good paid job.
He speaks about of the sperationseparation by geography and ideology which is often named in Washington.
But this separation doesn't exist for him and he said that all of the people their are living in America share the same values and the same hope.
